assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: AS Ditton pievadkezu rupnica manufactures and sells driving chains in Europe and internationally. It offers roller, motorcycle and snowmobile, automotive, leaf, special, and other chains. The company also engages in the manufacture and sale of parts and accessories for motor vehicles; manufacture and repair of fabricated metal products, mechanisms, and equipment; installation of production equipment and devices; sale, maintenance, and repair of motorcycles, accessories, and related parts; and manufacture of metal tanks, reservoirs, and containers. In addition, it is involved in forging, pressing, stamping, and rolling metals and metallurgy powder; mechanical treatment of metals and coating of the surface; warehousing and storage business; buying and sale of real estate properties; leasing and facility management of owned and leased real estate properties; metal constructions; and other activities. The company was formerly known as Joint Stock Company Daugavpils pievadkezu rupnica and changed its name to AS Ditton pievadkezu rupnica in January 2002. AS Ditton pievadkezu rupnica was founded in 1949 and is based in Daugavpils, Latvia.
